quests.name: The Collector
quests.description: Help Umbacano, a collector of ancient artifacts, recover the "Ten Ancestors", a set of ancient Ayleid statues.

quests.name: Nothing You Can Possess
quests.description: Umbacano wants you to recover a decorative carving from the High Fane.

quests.name: Secrets of the Ayleids
quests.description: Umbacano wants you to try to buy the Crown of Nenalata from a rival collector.

quests.name: Order of the Virtuous Blood
quests.description: You are asked to help kill a vampire.

quests.name: Imperial Corruption
quests.description: One of the Imperial Guard captains in the Imperial City is corrupt.

quests.name: Unfriendly Competition
quests.description: A newly opened shop run by Thoronir is selling goods below cost, causing big problems for the other merchants.

quests.name: An Unexpected Voyage
quests.description: The Bloated Float Inn has been hijacked by brigands while you slept!

quests.name: Vampire Cure
quests.description: A long quest to gain the cure for vampirism.

quests.name: Imperial Arena
quests.description: Rise through the ranks to become the Imperial Arena Grand Champion.

quests.name: Origin of the Gray Prince
quests.description: Agronak gro-Malog, the Imperial Arena Grand Champion asks you to find proof of his noble birthright.
